page.title: 07Childrens health in Cheshunt
page.content: This survey was taken of 28 eight year olds. We found out that half of the children have been unwell and have been to the doctors surgery this year. A quarter of the class had the doctor call at their house. Most of the class were born in hospital. This year only two children visited the hospital to have stitches and none have stayed in. One third of the class have had an x_ray this year. Everyone has had an eye test and has been checked by the school dentist. Nearly everyone has been to the dentist, one third of the children have had a filling and the same number had a tooth out. We found out that more than half the children had sweets every day. Half of the children have hurt themselves on their bikes. Children have been ill more often than their mums and dads.
